entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan<T> CreateSpan<T>(RuntimeFieldHandle) #60948
  • SPMI collections need to use release System.Private.Corelib #60947
  • comma as decimal stopped working #60938
  • ReadyToRun + WPF + PublishTrimmed=true does not generate valid executable #60936
  • ConvertToGeneratedDllImportFixerTests.PreferredAttributeOrder failed in CI #60934
  • PerformanceCounter_BeginInitEndInit_ProcessorCounter failed in CI #60933
  • createdump crash report can have multiple threads indicated as crashed #60932
    6.0.0
  • What are the reasons behind limiting the number of requested sockets to `65535` for Socket.Select()? #60930
  • Linker tests failing with no space left on device on Linux x64 #60927
    7.0.0
  • Path of MyDocuments folder change in Windows11 #60924
    7.0.0
  • My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile Bug (It Changes LastWriteTime) #60923
  • Continue #13436 #60920
  • [API Proposal]: Support dotnet watch in launchSettings.json #60919
  • Support PROCESSOR_COUNT envvar on mono #60915
  • DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToGeneratedDllImportAnalyzerTests.TypeRequiresMarshalling_ReportsDiagnostic #60909
  • SIGSEGV crash at x64 linux alpine-net6 docker in NetSecurityNative_ImportPrincipalName #60906
  • [API Proposal]: Expose TryRead() as public on JsonConverter #60904
    7.0.0
  • Provide File System Support for Blazor wasm #60907
  • [API Proposal]: DirectoryInfo.Copy / Directory.Copy #60903
  • [DllImportGenerator] Invalid code may be generated when containing type has multiple declarations with unsafe modifier on some #60902
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][tests] Regex source generator test failures #60899
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/interactions/throw1dimarray_r/throw1dimarray_r.sh #60898

Closed

  • handle that content-encoding can lie #58568
    7.0.0
  • TimeOnly could not represent 24 h #60941
    Future
  • Exception not caught using lambda expression / LINQ Select #60872
  • DateTimeMaskTest depends on the region configuration of the machine #34565
    Future
  • Incorrect date format in Windows 10 and Windows 11 #60845
    7.0.0
  • Enable test coverage report for generator projects #52032
    Future
  • Proposal: Extension method to add or update a range for an ImmutableDictionary #28924
    Future
  • Dictionary iterate reference of value #30703
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M13-RTM/b98958/b98958/b98958.sh #60820
    7.0.0
  • Allow custom equality comparer on ConcurrentDictionary TryUpdate #25559
    Future
  • PlatformNotSupportedException - On Windows while using the `.UseWindowsService()` #60875
  • Linux binary does not respect dotnet PATH settings (.NET 6 RC2) #60912
  • Socket.get_DualMode getter throws exception #33931
    Future
  • Broken Link to .NET Forums #60837
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException when trying to create an algorithm instance (Aes.Create) in Blazor #60897
  • Why do I have to deploy the "runtimes" folder on a box with dotnet runtime installed? #60844

PullRequests

Created

  • Mitigate NU1103 Error showing up during Maui Builds #60946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use lower call count threshold for tiering in debug builds #60945
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable sourcelink in source-build to produce `.version` file in shared fx #60944
  • JIT: Improve VN for (EQ/NE (RELOP ...), 0/1) #60943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Make PreferredAttributeOrder test ConditionalTheory #60940
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test bug, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] for non-seekable file handles, the OVERLAPPED offset must be set to 0 #60931
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Don't flag methods that already have GeneratedDllImport #60929
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] preparation for module encapsulation #60928
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix `build-native.cmd` for direct use #60926
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update JsonNode doc #60925
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Support AMR64/ARM environment variables for #53122. #60916
    community-contribution
  • Enable new analyzers in global configs #60914
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Clean-up crossgen's NuGet dependencies et. al. #59914
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow for multiple copies of the same ModuleId to be found in iteration #60874
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add 2009 Jit Architecture Plan (excerpts) #60939
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DateTimeMaskTest depends on the region configuration of the machine #60840
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Update Codespaces configuration #60900
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add analyzer assemblies to code coverage #60859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Detect more XHarness exit codes, lower installation timeout #60908
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add a micro optimization to fill_runtime_generic_context (). #60839
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use IndexOf(..., span) in Regex FindFirstChar #60888
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Do not force create new IG for align instruction #60901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the queue to Windows.10.Amd64.X86.Rt #60921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToGeneratedDllImportAnalyzerTests.TypeRequiresMarshalling_ReportsDiagnostic #60911
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Properly type primary selectors in `fgMemoryVNForLoopSideEffects` #60505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixes Broken Link to .NET Forums #60867
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add configureonly option to host native build #60889
    area-Infrastructure
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Properly use result value for dump IPC cmd #60726
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Setting nullable string properties from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][workloads] Workload 7.0.100 #60893
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Alter amount of tests that run per PR for mono mobile configurations #60727
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60702
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix some typos in corhdr.h #60895
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ci test #59222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor jump threading to prepare for allowing side effects #60884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extract various changes from the invoke and custom marshaler PRs #60877
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • Removed two unused packages #60798
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix Equals overload logic for some methods of an array created using MLC #60894
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix for #60340 #60863
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Fix a thread local test #60892
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix UnobservedTaskException from SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync #60890
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60861
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-mono, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Disable package validation in source-build for reliability #60881
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] PInvokeTableGenerator: Fixup symbol names with invalid chars #60814
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2 - UseWPF project with multiple semi-colon delimited SDKs fails as it tries to treat the set as a single SDK #22363
  • Miscellaneous .NET 7 work #22362
    7.0.1xx
  • The .NET SDK is unnecessarily shipping 'ref' assemblies in the product #22359
  • Workloads should be able to control the relative import order of .props and .targets #22358
    6.0.2xx
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2: dotnet publish --runtime fails when project has EFMigrations #22357
  • dotnet add package should support centrally managed packages. #22356
  • `dotnet run` doesn't set SolutionDir #22342
  • Hot reload on Key Press 'R' #22340

Closed

  • Miscellaneous .NET 6 work #12900
    6.0.1xx
  • Workloads: Support custom install locations #19774
    6.0.1xx
  • Write library for reading workload manifests #11230
    6.0.1xx
  • Switch tool install to using PackageDownloader #22349
    6.0.2xx
  • Enable implicit RID with `--sc` #21405
    7.0.1xx
  • Double writes on publish, causes R2R task failure #3510
    Backlog
  • dotnet install does not create signed apphost on macOS Arm64 #21349
    6.0.1xx
  • Audit all file writes to make sure incremental build works correctly #497
    3.0.1xx
  • Mark skipped tests as skipped instead of passing #736
    3.0.1xx
  • Reenable test that desktop MSBuild can build RID-specific apps with portable dependencies #877
    3.0.1xx
  • Surface appropriate errors for unsupported references #1027
    3.0.1xx
  • Need to update Full framework CI machines with new NuGet #1327
    3.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix usage of IndexOf that didn't respect current culture #22364
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Port to 6.0.2xx] Update System.CommandLine version #22351
    Area-CLI
  • [Port to 6.0.2xx] Fix run warning output formatting issue #22350
    Area-CLI
  • Update branding for 6.0.200 #22337
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add implicit RIDs when not specified on self contained option #22314
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22334
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • Fix nuget authenticated feed interaction #22251
    Area-Workloads
  • Add tool install implicit RIDs #22331
    Area-Tools
  • Argument BC(--r/--a), add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidCastException from DefiniteAssignmentPass during extract method analysis #57428
  • Code cleanup doesn't apply "this." qualifier to object initializer #57424
  • Failure in CSharpCodeActions.GFUFuzzyMatchAfterRenameTrackingAndAfterGenerateType #57423
  • Failure in LspMiscellaneousFilesWorkspaceTests.TestLooseFile_MovedToRegisteredWorkspace #57422
  • Official builds keep failing in an opaque manner #57420
  • [SourceLink] Use PEReader to try to read pdbs #57417
  • csharp_indent_preprocessor_region=usual_indent vs. preprocessor-disabled code #57416
  • Pull Members up on Interfaces does not move documentation to interfaces #57415
  • SyntaxToken.GetLocation().GetLineSpan() crashes with an ArgumentOutOfRangeException when visiting XmlTextLiteralNewLineToken #57413
    17.1
  • Roslyn fails to detect nullability problems in C# 10 interpolated string handlers #57412

Closed

  • Assert fails in SourceGeneratedFileItemSource.cs line 120 #57287
    17.1
  • Make sure we have test coverage for all bound nodes that directly or indirectly store Conversion #53870
    17.1
  • Snippets Revamp #55557
    17.1
  • Request for improvement of TextSpan.ToString() documentation. #57299
    17.1
  • VS freezes when using Roslyn experimental instance containing multiple TFMs #57289
    17.1
  • Rationalize VB and C# anonymous delegate types. #55292
    17.1
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #55896
    17.1

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix active Component Governance bugs #37889
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Investigate `aspnetcore-components-e2e` Pipeline #37888
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Blazor Components ILogger no longer receives class type. 5.0->6.0 #37887
  • Self-Contained ASP.NET + Blazor WASM fails on Publish #37886
  • Blazor WASM AggregateExeption Flatten Message Prefix #37883
  • Perf regression: https #37880
  • Docker compose Linux container error "The path must be absolute." #37876
  • Virtualize component is missing support to virtualize DataTable.Rows #37875
  • .NET 6.0 blazor wasm project reports an incorrect type #37871
    6.0.x
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37868
  • Startup regression: json, mvc #37867
  • Add maxLength in PasswordOptions #37866
  • Incorrect info tooltip for 'Enable OpenAPI support' checkbox #37864
    6.0.x
  • Quarantining StreamPool_Heartbeat_ExpiredStreamRemoved #37862
    Next sprint planning

Closed

  • NoHotReloadListenersAreOrdinarilyRegistered fails about 50% of the time locally #35449
    6.0-docs-infra
  • JsonPatchDocument should use System.Text.Json in ASP.NET 6 #30635
    Backlog
  • Quarantined Test: RemoveInProcessReference_FailedToFindRequestHandler #31893
    7.0-preview1
  • Flaky test - ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #36887
    7.0-preview1
  • Test failure: `ShadowCopyE2EWorksWithOldFoldersPresent` #37081
    7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Smoke test HTTP/3 on real websites #34859
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression: mvc #37839
  • .NET 5 Blazor WASM standalone publish problems #37874
  • VS2022 RC2 Brand new Blazor project doesn't run #37858
  • Breakpoints in Javascript files inside Razor Class Libraries not working in VS2022 / .NET 6 #37872
  • SignalR Cilent Connection state connected and connectionID is Null ? #37488
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, proxy-yarp #37792
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #37804
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #37673
  • HttpConnectionContext Disposes WindowsIdentity objects it does not own #37521
    .NET 7 Planning
  • WebApplicationFactory - Exception not being caught by HttpClient #19217
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove quarantine attributes from Blazor e2e tests #37890
    area-blazor
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37881
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37879
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • feat (Codespaces) - Added Commonly used tasks to `tasks.json` for VSCode users. #37873
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update description for EnableOpenAPI flag #37865
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Replace NoHotReloadListenersAreOrdinarilyRegistered with unit tests #37768
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix helix-matrix internal #37884
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine tests #37877
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Missed lockfile freezing #37882
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine StreamPool_Heartbeat_ExpiredStreamRemoved #37863
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37781
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37848
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37816
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37819

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Incorrect measure/layout in item template #3154
  • [Bug] Deleting recipe causes nav bar change #3150
  • Migrating from Xamarin.Forms (Preview)[Bug] #3148
  • [Bug] Shell pages cannot work with DI #3147
  • [Bug] Recipes Search Results currently can't be opened via keyboard #3145
  • [Bug] My Recipes items can't be opened via the enter key on the keyboard #3144
  • [Bug] If there's a TapGestureRecognizer with a single click attached to an element it should also trigger from the enter key #3143
  • [Enhancement] Allow to invalidate GraphicsView #3140
  • [Bug] empty space appears on ios #3139
  • [Bug] Editor height request not working on ios #3138
  • [Bug] Date and Time pickers keyboard typing should not work #3131
  • [Bug] WebView Related event failure, Android and cookie Setting failure #3130

Closed

  • [Bug] ImageButton rendering issue #2849
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] [Android] Null Reference Exception when creating Path with no Data set. #2466
  • [Bug] Shapes don't draw with color #2858
  • [Bug] Shadows don't render on Shapes #2859
  • [Bug] iframe with querystring to local file inside MAUI Blazor App #3061
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView not filling viewport on iOS #2995

PullRequests

Created

  • Prep Update to WASDK Preview 3 #3153
  • Fix iOS splash screens in partial builds #3152
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Add ContainerView to Layout if it's present #3151
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Housekeeping] Add pending Core interfaces comments #3146
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement Invalidate method in GraphicsView #3142
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls #3141

Merged

  • Avoid NRE using a Path without Data #3134
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Allow to use Color type where a Brush is expected #3132
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Add more Shadow device tests #3133
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix swap EmptyView on CollectionView handler #3149
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3129
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [WinUI] Implement SearchBar IsTextPredictionEnabled property #2911
    area/controls 🎮
  • Handle query strings in Blazor static assets by trimming them out #3088
    area/blazor 🕸️, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [WIP] Make templates open a default file #3116
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.101-preview.10

Updated

  • Try using an internal feed on DevDiv #3128
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.101-preview.10

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TagWith/TagWithCallSite with lazy loading tags only first query #26474
  • When removing the relation of a parent/child entities with Foreign key as string, the child is deleted without notification. #26473
  • EF generates invalid SQL when using enums in projections #26472
  • Reexamine our SQL composability check with regards to WITH #26471
  • Query: enable temporal tables for table splitting scenarios #26469

Closed

  • SQLite Spatial: Allow specifying a default SRID and dimension #13244
  • SQLite+SQLCipher (Android): Connection stays open after EnsureDeleted() #13193
    Backlog
  • Generate a conventionless model configuration #12511
  • Consider always doing server evaluation for functions that don't have client implementation #11466
    3.1.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Leverage ADO.NET spec tests #13833
  • Consider generic ModelBuilder<TContext> and new OnModelCreating #11034
  • Implement useful mappings in EF.Functions #9585
    5.0.0
  • Disable _EFMigrationsHistory (HistoryRepository) when generating scripts in migrations #8970
  • InMemory: Enable case sensitivity/insensitivity setting #6153
    Backlog
  • Idea: WebSQL Provider (Sqlite on Blazor) #10999
  • Understand what would "working better with F# records" would entail #10731
  • Automatically perform required conversions when query filter is defined on interface or base type #10257
  • Allow application code to force query buffering #10159
  • Consider adding sugar method(s) to obtain the discriminator property's configuration #9384
  • Unable to cast object of type 'System.Func`2 using entity framework core. v1.1.1 #8182
  • Create database views in Migrations using SQL generated from a LINQ projection #465
  • Check and update service lifetime docs #26444
    7.0.0
  • How to create foreign keys using fluent API and Value Convertors #26465

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not scaffold a default constructor when OnConfiguring is suppressed #26470

Merged

  • No skipped tests in non-functional tests #26450
  • Check and update service lifetime docs #26445
  • Update to .NET SDK 6.0 RC2 #26394

Updated

  • Query: Throw exception for null key value in non-tracking #26311
  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • Evolve null-checking approach #26459

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installer 6.1.21.52610 shows .NET 5.0 for "VisualStudioWarning" string on German Windows #12546

Closed

  • Finalizer should remove workload records #11667
    6.0.1xx
  • Investigate the size increase during build #8017
    6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to 6.0 in our wxl files as that was reverted a while back. #12550
  • Allow SDK to produce reference assemblies #12549
  • Update branding for 6.0.2xx #12548
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12544

Merged

  • Bump the emscripten manifest version to 7.0.100 band #12542
  • Remove RC2 and 3.1.1xx from the table. #12485
  • Resolve source-build dotnet-format patch conflict #12545
  • [release/5.0.2xx] Fix blocking install of ARM64 on clean machine #12538
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/5.0.4xx] Fix blocking install of ARM64 on clean machine #12539
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12371
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Remove uneeded roslyn patch #12531

Updated

  • GetRuntimeInformation.targets: determine PortableProductMonikerRid based on OSName and Architecture. #12516
  • [release/6.0.1xx] dotnet/runtime: Enable source-link in source-build for '.version' file #12527
  • [release/6.0.1xx] dotnet/runtime: Disable package validation in source-build for reliability #12526
  • [release/6.0.1xx] [ArPow] Add smoke test for OmniSharp #12251
